intent_atoms.description: Bookmark identifiers must be persisted consistently across the recents JSON store and workspace session snapshots.
Introduce a BookmarkPersistenceManaging abstraction to provide a consistent bookmark store contract for UI controllers and tests, enabling dependency injection for deterministic TDD scenarios.
Provision a shared BookmarkPersistenceStore in ISOInspectorApp composition alongside the recents directory.

functional_units.name: Bookmark Persistence Store
functional_units.description: Provides unified persistence of bookmark identifiers across recents JSON store and workspace session snapshots, normalizing payloads and migrating existing data.

functional_units.name: Document Session Controller Integration
functional_units.description: Wires BookmarkPersistenceStore into DocumentSessionController to manage bookmark state within document sessions.

functional_units.name: Bookmark Persistence Managing Abstraction
functional_units.description: Defines a shared contract for bookmark storage used by UI controllers and tests, enabling dependency injection for deterministic testing.

functional_units.name: ISOInspectorApp Composition Update
functional_units.description: Configures ISOInspectorApp to provision a shared BookmarkPersistenceStore alongside the recents directory.
